mapper.select: select m.ID as id ,m.PASSWORD as password ,m.NAME as name ,m.AGE as age ,m.SEX as sex ,m.BMI as bmi ,m.HEIGHT as height ,m.SALARY as salary ,m.LATEST_EDU as latestEdu ,c.CASH as cash ,g.grade as grade ,m.LATEST_EDU_INDEX as latestEduIndex ,m.GRADE_INDEX as gradeIndex ,m.TOTAL_SCORE as totalScore ,m.NORMALIZED_TOTAL_SCORE as normalizedTotalScore from member m, cash_table c, grade g where m.id = c.id and m.id = #{id} and g.grade_index = m.grade_index

select m.ID ,m.PASSWORD ,m.NAME ,m.AGE ,m.SEX ,m.BMI ,m.HEIGHT ,m.SALARY ,m.LATEST_EDU as latestEdu ,c.CASH ,m.LATEST_EDU_INDEX as latestEduIndex ,m.GRADE_INDEX as gradeIndex ,m.TOTAL_SCORE as totalScore ,m.NORMALIZED_TOTAL_SCORE as normalizedTotalScore ,g.grade from member m, grade g, cash_table c where m.sex = #{sex} and m.grade_index = g.grade_index and m.id = c.id order by NORMALIZED_TOTAL_SCORE desc

select m.ID as id ,m.PASSWORD as password ,m.NAME as name ,m.AGE as age ,m.SEX as sex ,m.BMI as bmi ,m.HEIGHT as height ,m.SALARY as salary ,m.LATEST_EDU as latestEdu ,c.CASH as cash ,m.LATEST_EDU_INDEX as latestEduIndex ,m.GRADE_INDEX as gradeIndex ,g.grade as grade ,m.TOTAL_SCORE as totalScore ,m.NORMALIZED_TOTAL_SCORE as normalizedTotalScore ,matched_id as matchedId ,invited as invited ,match_lock as matchedLock ,success as success ,account_lock as accountLock ,lock_count as lockCount from member m, grade g, match_and_lock l, cash_table c where m.grade_index = g.grade_index and m.id = l.id and c.id = m.id
